TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Experience a streamlined narrative as you level to the new max of 50!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Visit a Barber Shop to explore all-new looks.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Explore your updated class abilities and prepare for the coming darkness.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Pledge loyalty to one of four unique covenants and gain new powers.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Visit a Barber Shop to explore all-new looks.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Explore the realms of the afterlife and uncover the mysteries of death.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Push back the Jailer's forces in the rediscovered City of Secrets.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Reach new heights with the revamped progression system.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Defend the eternal forest from the Banshee Queen's incursion!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Thwart a high-stakes broker heist in the Veiled Market!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Updated dungeon and PvP rewards, and the new Mythic+ affix: Tormented.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: At long last, battle Sylvanas Windrunner as you raid the Jailer's stronghold!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Challenge yourself in Mythic+ Legion dungeons and the Mage Tower.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Improved leveling, reputation, and catch-up gear for alternate characters!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Freely change your covenant at maximum Renown.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Learn the language of the Automa and unlock powerful rewards.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Battle through 8 floors of the deadliest foes from every wing of Torghast.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Confront the Jailer's forces in the otherworldly land of the First Ones.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Updated dungeon and PvP rewards, and the new Mythic+ affix: Encrypted.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Unique armor looks and bonuses aid your fight to save the Shadowlands.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Explore the forbidden sanctum and thwart the Jailer's plan to dominate reality.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Can the Forsaken reclaim the ruins of Lordaeron and forge a new future?
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Do battle in a new PvP arena set within the ancient wonders of Zereth Mortis.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: For the first time, assemble a dungeon, raid, or rated PvP group with members from both factions!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Earn new rewards in Mythic Keystone dungeons and PvP.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Experience iconic legacy dungeons with Mythic affixes!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Return to Shadowlands raids for a new challenge and new rewards.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: The UI has undergone an art refresh. Customize it with the new Edit Mode!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: November 28
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Explore the brand new class and specialization trees and create your own talent build!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Vanquish powerful elementals in storms that have erupted across Azeroth.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Brave the perils of Uldaman to secure the future of dragonkind.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Azeroth's newest race and class has awakened. Wield the power of the dragonflights to deal damage or heal your allies.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: New features including crafting orders, equipment, specializations, and more!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Soar through the Dragon Isles' skies with a thrilling new movement system!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Travel to the ancestral home of the dragonflights and help them reclaim their legacy.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Earn rewards with the new Rated Solo Shuffle mode.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: A new dungeon rotation and the "Thundering" affix await.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Stop the Primalists from releasing Raszageth's imprisoned kin.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Battle against the Primalists within the Primalist Future for epic rewards.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: White and gray items can now be collected for transmog!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: A new shop for cosmetics is now open in Stormwind and Orgrimmar.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Collect distinctive armor sets as you explore these races' cultures and histories.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Exciting new rewards for bringing your friends to Azeroth!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Delve into the mysteries of the dracthyr left behind during their escape.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Race through Zaralek Cavern on the new native dragonriding mount!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: For the first time, Horde and Alliance players can unite in the same guild!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Continue the story of the Sundered Flame and confront the Incarnates' forces in this forgotten underground expanse.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Earn new rewards in Mythic Keystone dungeons and PvP
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Experience new affixes and a refreshed Mythic+ pool of dungeons!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Pursue Sarkareth and explore the legacy of Neltharion in this ancient laboratory.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: A new damage specialization with a unique support-based playstyle!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Support the Bronze Dragonflight in Eon's Fringe and Time Rifts!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Battle the Infinite Dragonflight in a mythic mega-dungeon!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Collect distinctive armor sets as you explore these races' cultures and histories.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Visit the Options Menu to start communicating faster with pings.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Battle dream-empowered foes across the Dragon Isles as Amirdrassil prepares to bloom!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Join the defense of the dream with a new renown, events, and rewards.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Join an 8v8 solo queue Battleground experience and in this mode, everything goes fast!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Enter the dream and defend the blooming world tree Amirdrassil from Fyrakk and the Druids of the Flame.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Earn new rewards in Mythic Keystone dungeons and PvP!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Heroic, Mythic, and Timewalking Dungeons now unlock vault rewards.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Stop Fyrakk from consuming Amirdrassil and turning the Emerald Dream into a burning wasteland.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Dive into the lost lore and legends of the Dragon Isles.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Queue up for Dragonflight dungeons with NPC followers!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Join Genn Greymane and the Gilneans as they retake their homeland.

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Earn new rewards.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Heroic, Mythic, and Mythic+ difficulty and rewards reworked.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Conquer all three Dragonflight raids for updated rewards!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Collect Plunder to earn rewards such as mounts, pets, and transmogs!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: To play, log out and select Plunderstorm on the character select screen.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Pirates clash in a grand battle royale!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Collect Bronze to earn mounts, pets, and appearances!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Create a new Timerunner on the character select screen.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Experience a wild new twist to the Mists of Pandaria!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Collect distinctive armor sets while exploring their cultures and histories.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: A wild way to level starts next week!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: As peace returns to the Dragon Isles, a dark plan is set in motion.

Header_lang: New in The War Within Pre-Patch!
TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Vanquish foes from Azeroth's past as memories resurface. Available July 30th!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Launches August 26 (Early Access August 22).
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Your characters share access to a Warbands bank, Dragonflight reputations, and more!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Dive deep into Delves, unravel mysteries, and seek treasure.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Expand your class fantasy and customize your talent build!
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Travel to Khaz Algar and heed the call of the Radiant Song!

TopLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Earn rewards in Mythic dungeons and the new Rated Battleground Blitz!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc_lang: Assault the seat of Queen Ansurek's power within Azj-Kahet.
RightFeatureDesc_lang: Progress in new Seasonal Delve content to unlock Zekvir's Lair.
